item.title: Contributing
item.description: There are two ways to contribute to the Sliflist. 1 - Suggest / Tweak Rolls Roll philosophy and format is discussed over in “What’s in a Roll?". 2 - Improve the Sliflist Itself To see about contributing to the codebase that creates the wishlist and generates this site, head over to @rslifka/sliflist.

item.title: What's in a Roll?
item.description: With so many weapons and potential rolls, one main goal of the Sliflist is to make submitting rolls as easy as possible to reduce the barrier to populating the Sliflist. In order to do that, we first need to explain the roll format and how a roll turns into DIM wishlist entries. Sliflist Thesis Over the past two years, we’ve noticed that many rolls fall into the same pattern: The perfect (aka “god”) roll, getting exactly what perks you want in every column, including the masterwork.
